description_en: A shoulders exercise focusing on the rear deltoid.
description_ar: تمرين shoulders يركز على rear deltoid.
instructions_en: Hinge at hips, torso nearly parallel to floor
Arms hang down, slight elbow bend
Raise arms to sides, squeeze shoulder blades
tips_en: Using too much weight → Lighter, feel the squeeze
Not bending over enough → Torso parallel to floor
Arms going too far back → Stop at shoulder level

description_en: A shoulders exercise focusing on the rear deltoid, rhomboids.

instructions_en: Set cable at face height or slightly above
Grip rope with thumbs toward you
Pull toward face, elbows high and out
Externally rotate at end (thumbs point back)
